title: Bob

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bob is the owner of Bob's Brilliant Axes in southern Lumbridge. Players can pay Bob to repair damaged Barrows equipment. However, many players prefer to repair their Barrows armour at an armour stand in a player-owned house because it is usually cheaper depending on the player's Smithing level.

This article is about the NPC in Lumbridge. For other NPCs, see Bob (disambiguation).
This article is about non-event NPC. For 2021 Birthday event NPC, see Bob (2021 Birthday event).

NPC ID10619, hist2812

Bob is the owner of Bob's Brilliant Axes in southern Lumbridge. Players can pay Bob to repair damaged Barrows equipment. However, many players prefer to repair their Barrows armour at an armour stand in a player-owned house because it is usually cheaper depending on the player's Smithing level.

Bob is also featured briefly in the Death to the Dorgeshuun quest, which shows him to dislike the Dorgeshuun. Believing Zanik to be a violent goblin, he screams at the player and Zanik to leave his store. He also expresses displeasure at having the Gnome Child in his store during the 20th Anniversary event, initially saying that he "does not serve their kind", before being flattered after the Gnome Child mistook him for Robert the Strong.

He is one of the people in Lumbridge that can be approached about the disturbance to the castle basement wall in The Lost Tribe.

Bob was one of the Lumbridge citizens to be attacked by a monkey during the 2021 Birthday event.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 March 2021
(update)

Bob (2021 Birthday event) was replaced with the regular Bob. Bob's NPC ID changed to 10619.

17 February 2021
(update)

Bob was removed from the world and replaced with a nameless NPC in the game's cache. Bob (2021 Birthday event) took his place in the world for the 2021 Birthday event.

21 May 2015
(update | poll)

Bob gained a right-click option to repair Barrows equipment.

13 June 2013
(update | poll)

Bob and the other item repairers can now repair all your Barrows kit in a single transaction.

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • A comment was written by Mod John A, the main developer of Death to the Dorgeshuun, in the RuneScript code for Bob's dialogue during the quest, which states "Bob is a crazy racist!"[1]
  • Bob's statement that he doesn't "serve their kind", in reference to the gnome child, may be a reference to Star Wars, in which a similar statement is made towards C-3PO by the bartender of the Mos Eisley Cantina.
  • The painting inside Bob's Brilliant Axe's may be a reference to Bob Ross's "Distant Mountain's" painting, as the framing and subject are nearly identical.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 2 January 2021. (Archived from the original on 9 January 2021.) Mod Ash: "The developer's intention, in Death to the Dorgeshuun, was very clearly for Bob to be racist: [1]"
